Text.Page:
I keep thinking I'm going to be able to finally get this survey taken care of, but things keep cropping up! The {@LinkCreature:5#15#Hungry Cullar} and the {@LinkCreature:5#15#tentacullar} keep strolling through right where I want to be. They aren't the nicest critters.

I don't suppose you could wander over there and take them out for me? It would make finishing this survey so much easier.

Finished already? Wow, thank you! I should be able to finish this up in no time without the critters in my way.

Take this for your efforts. I, and by extension, Ackerly, really apprecitae this.
